item.description: Forensic Mental Health Evaluations for Courts, Institutions, & Legal Professionals

item.title: Board Certification
item.description: Dr. Freedman was Board Certified in Forensic Psychology by the American Board of Professional Psychology (ABPP) in 2014. He is among approximately 300 Board Certified Forensic Psychologists in the United States who have been certified by ABPP.

item.title: Clinicial Evaluation
item.description: Clinical evaluations for children, adolescents and adults designed to aid treatment or answer specific, non-legal questions.

item.title: Forensic Evaluation
item.description: Mental health evaluations which are typically court ordered and used in a legal or adversarial process. In this category are evaluations related to parenting, personal injury, any form of competency, risk assessment or employment issues.

item.title: Professional Affiliations
item.description: Dr. Freedman maintains active memberships with the following professional organizations.

item.title: Psychological Consultation
item.description: Consultation to attorneys and mental health professionals to address questions that pertain to the interaction of psychology and the legal system.

item.title: Scientific Expert Testimony
item.description: Expert witness testimony on empirical psychological research and professional literature pertaining to a legal question before the court.
